title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a bowl, whisk eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta until crispy. Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture. Serve with black pepper and Parmesan.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a mix of colorful vegetables and savory sauce.
